creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: nine lines, spaced well apart; first line slants slightly towards L; second to last line lighter, and shorter; last line (signature) indented slightly; two stacked stamps at LLC, top stamp intaglio, bottom stamp relief
markings: LLC, square intaglio; LLC, square relief; on back, bottom center, in pencil: [Kobi]
title: Poem While Traveling
